short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a helper tool that scans the external link URLs on the active tab and saves them into a JSON file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a helper tool that scans the external link URLs on the active tab and saves them into a JSON file.

Note:
This tool is in its beta and works on Semrush.com only.
